title: Segmentation Data
description: JSON containing pixel coordinates of different segments in an image

segments.description: Divides the entire image into different segments where each segment indicates a noteworthy region or structure. For example a park image would be divided into sections that contain grass, sections that contain trees etc.

items.description: Contains information about each individual segment in an image. Information such as area, centre of segment etc are included in this section

nameOfSegment.description: This section contains the name of the segment

coord.description: This section contains the normalised coordinates for each segment. A maximum of 101 coordinate values are passed in the json to limit the size of json

centroid.description: This section contains the centroid for a segment. It represents the centre value of the entire segment. The centroid coordinates are normalised between 0 and 1

area.description: Total area occupied by the segment in a gien image. the area is normalised between 0 and 1
